paper_abstract: In this work, the initial-boundary value problem of two-dimensional Cahn-Hilliard equation is considered. A class of fully discrete dissipative Fourier spectral schemes are proposed. Moreover, semi-implicit prediction-correction schemes are presented. The numerical simulations are performed to demonstrate the effectiveness of the proposed schemes. (C) 2009 Elsevier Inc. All rights reserved.
paper_title: A class of stable spectral methods for the Cahn-Hilliard equation
